jobs.title: National OTR Driver
jobs.description:
Running Area:

Nationwide OTR position covering all 48 states with consistent freight.

Pay & Mileage:

  • Gross Weekly Average: $1,450/week
  • Average 2,400+ miles per week
  • $1,250 weekly pay protection
  • Top earners make $1,750 per week
  • Safety bonus miles, driven miles, and green zones (extra 5¢ per mile) contribute to additional pay

Freight & Schedule:

Consistent freight with weekly home time options.
requirements: 12+ months of Class A CDL experience
No more than 2 moving violations in 12 months
No more than 4 moving violations in 3 years
No more than 1 serious violation in 3 years
No more than 3 accidents in 36 months
benefits: Vacation pay beginning after six months

jobs.title: Coast to Coast Team
jobs.description:
Running Area:

Nationwide team position running coast to coast with a partner.

Pay & Mileage:

  • Gross Weekly Average: $1,550/week per driver
  • Average 5,000+ miles per week
  • $1,350 weekly pay protection per driver
  • Top earners make $2,200 per week per driver
  • Safety bonus miles, driven miles, and green zones (extra 5¢ per mile) contribute to additional pay

Freight & Schedule:

Run coast to coast with a partner with 2-3 weeks out followed by 4-5 days home time.
requirements: 12+ months of Class A CDL experience
No more than 2 moving violations in 12 months
No more than 4 moving violations in 3 years
No more than 1 serious violation in 3 years
No more than 3 accidents in 36 months
benefits: Vacation pay beginning after six months

jobs.title: Premium Flatbed Driver - Home Weekly
jobs.description:
Running Area:

Southeast regional flatbed position with consistent freight and weekly home time.

Pay & Benefits:

  • Choice of $0.53-0.55/mile OR 27% of load
  • Average weekly gross: $1,400-$1,800
  • Annual earnings: $70,000-$90,000
  • Paid orientation and training
  • Excellent benefits package

Home Time & Equipment:

Home weekly (not guaranteed on weekends) with late model Peterbilt 579 with 72" high roof sleeper.
requirements: 12+ months of Class A CDL experience
No more than 2 moving violations in 12 months
No more than 4 moving violations in 3 years
No more than 1 serious violation in 3 years
No more than 3 accidents in 36 months
benefits: Vacation pay beginning after six months

jobs.title: Owner Operator Lease Program
jobs.description:
Running Area:

Central and Eastern US with consistent freight and flexible scheduling.

Program Highlights:

  • No money down
  • Walkaway lease with no balloon payment
  • Weekly take-home potential: $1,250-$1,550
  • Maintenance program available
  • Fuel discount program
  • No forced dispatch

Equipment:

2015 Freightliner Cascadia with Detroit engines, automatic transmission.
requirements: 21+ years of age
Class A CDL
12+ months of verifiable OTR experience
No DUI/DWI in last 5 years
No more than 3 moving violations in 3 years
No more than 2 preventable DOT recordable accidents in 3 years
